structural_analysis.context_justification: The document starts with Adhyaya 5 (Pañcama), Brāhmaṇa 1 (Prathama), and the first verse/kandika is numbered 1. Hence, the starting coordinate is 5.1.1.
structural_analysis.filename_justification: Combines grantha ID, commentary slug (rangaramanuja), and zero-padded start ID (05-01-01) for unique, sortable naming.

proposed_strategy.name: Validated Group by Character Count
proposed_strategy.description: This strategy combines consecutive Brāhmaṇas, strictly ensuring no chunk exceeds the safety character limit. The total document length (~128k) is split into two optimal chunks.

parsing_instructions.justification: The text is structured hierarchically by Adhyaya, then Brāhmaṇa, followed by numbered Kandikas (verses). Brāhmaṇas serve as the main thematic divisions.
parsing_instructions.numbering_capture_strategy: The unit number (Brāhmaṇa ordinal) is captured from the Devanagari text in the heading.

start_pattern.description: A new Brāhmaṇa starts with the Adhyāya/Brāhmaṇa numbering, often followed by an optional name subtitle (captured in subsequent chunks).

end_pattern.description: The end of a Brāhmaṇa is marked by the colophon of the commentary (Prakāśikā).

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The document starts directly with the Adhyaya and Brāhmaṇa 1 content. No separate preliminary section needs handling.
